name: @vanillaes/mock-console
author: Evan Plaice <evanplaice@gmail.com> (https://evanplaice.com/)
description: Mock the 'console' (ie log, info, error) for testing

scripts.build: npm run build:cjs && npm run build:min && npm run build:typings
scripts.clean: npm run clean:builds && npm run clean:typings
scripts.clean:builds: npx rimraf index.cjs && npx rimraf index.min.js
scripts.package: npx rimraf package && npm pack | tail -n 1 | xargs tar -xf
scripts.preversion: npm test && npm run test:compat && npm run lint && npm run types
